src_original: nāsti muṣitā smṛtir,  nāsti asamāhitaṃ cittaṃ,

atīte 'dhvany apratihatam asaṃgajñānaṃ ca darśanaṃ ca,  anāgate 'dhvany apratihatam asaṃgajñānaṃ ca darśanaṃ ca,  pratyutpanne 'dhvany apratihatam asaṃgajñānaṃ ca darśanaṃ ca,  sarvakāyakarma jñānapūrvaṃgamaṃ jñānānuparivarti,  sarvavākkarma jñānapūrvaṃgamaṃ jñānānuparivarti,
katamāni ca subhūte tathāgatasya dvātriṃśad mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni?
